verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינ֗וֹת <S%H5058><s%> [Tbin-gi-Not, on Neginoth מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David בְּקָרְאִ֡י <S%H7121><s%> be-ka-re-'I me when I call עֲנֵ֤נִי׀ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni Hear אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> 'e-Lo-Hei O God צִדְקִ֗י <S%H6664><s%> tzid-Ki, of my righteousness בַּ֭צָּר <S%H6862><s%> Batz-tzor me [when I was] in distress הִרְחַ֣בְתָּ <S%H7337><s%> hir-Chav-ta thou hast enlarged לִּ֑י Li; חָ֝נֵּ֗נִי <S%H2603><s%> chon-ne-ni have mercy וּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> u-she-Ma' upon me and hear תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti. my prayer

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei O ye sons אִ֡ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of men עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- how long מֶ֬ה <S%H4100><s%> meh how כְבוֹדִ֣י <S%H3519><s%> che-vo-Di [will ye turn] my glory לִ֭כְלִמָּה <S%H3639><s%> Lich-lim-mah confusion תֶּאֱהָב֣וּן <S%H157><s%> te-'e-ha-Vun love רִ֑יק <S%H7385><s%> Rik; vanity תְּבַקְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1245><s%> te-vak-Shu [and] seek כָזָ֣ב <S%H3577><s%> cha-Zav deceitful סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

וּדְע֗וּ <S%H3045><s%> u-de-'U, But know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הִפְלָ֣ה <S%H6395><s%> hif-Lah hath set apart יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD חָסִ֣יד <S%H2623><s%> cha-Sid him that is godly ל֑וֹ lo; יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for himself the LORD יִ֝שְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> yish-Ma', will hear בְּקָרְאִ֥י <S%H7121><s%> be-ka-re-'I when I call אֵלָֽיו׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav. about

רִגְז֗וּ <S%H7264><s%> rig-Zu, Stand in awe וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תֶּ֫חֱטָ֥אוּ <S%H2398><s%> te-che-Ta-'u and sin אִמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> 'im-Ru not commune בִ֭לְבַבְכֶם <S%H3824><s%> Vil-vav-chem with your own heart עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon מִשְׁכַּבְכֶ֗ם <S%H4904><s%> mish-kav-Chem, upon your bed וְדֹ֣מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> ve-Dom-mu and be still סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

זִבְח֥וּ <S%H2076><s%> ziv-Chu Offer זִבְחֵי־ <S%H2077><s%> ziv-chei- the sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> Tze-dek; of righteousness וּ֝בִטְח֗וּ <S%H982><s%> u-vit-Chu, and put your trust אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. in the LORD

רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim [There be] many אֹמְרִים֮ <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim that say מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who יַרְאֵ֪נוּ֫ <S%H7200><s%> yar-'E-nu Who will shew ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov good נְֽסָה־ <S%H5375><s%> ne-sah- lift thou up עָ֭לֵינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lei-nu up א֨וֹר <S%H216><s%> or the light פָּנֶ֬יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha of thy countenance יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. LORD

נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah Thou hast put שִׂמְחָ֣ה <S%H8057><s%> sim-Chah gladness בְלִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> ve-lib-Bi; in my heart מֵעֵ֬ת <S%H6256><s%> me-'Et more than in the time דְּגָנָ֖ם <S%H1715><s%> de-ga-Nam [that] their corn וְתִֽירוֹשָׁ֣ם <S%H8492><s%> ve-ti-ro-Sham and their wine רָֽבּוּ׃ <S%H7231><s%> Rab-bu. increased

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> be-sha-Lom in peace יַחְדָּו֮ <S%H3162><s%> yach-Dav I will both אֶשְׁכְּבָ֪ה <S%H7901><s%> 'esh-ke-Vah lay me down וְאִ֫ישָׁ֥ן <S%H3462><s%> ve-'I-Shan and sleep כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah O יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for thou LORD לְבָדָ֑ד <S%H910><s%> le-va-Dad; only לָ֝בֶ֗טַח <S%H983><s%> la-Ve-tach, in safety תּוֹשִׁיבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3427><s%> to-shi-Ve-ni. makest me dwell
